definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Treasure Island by R.L. Stevenson 羅伯特·路易斯·斯蒂文森|罗伯特·路易斯·斯蒂文森[Luo2 bo2 te4 · Lu4 yi4 si1 · Si1 di4 wen2 sen1]
gold and silver foil/gold and silver leaf
the 5 metals: gold, silver, copper, iron and tin

sentences.english: But I'll buy more gold and silver if their prices come down.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我只会在金银价格下降的时候再多买点金银。

sentences.english: But I'll buy more gold and silver if their prices come down.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我只会在金银价格下降的时候再多买点金银。

sentences.english: Age -old jade artifacts, gold and silver ornaments, and paintings - just to name a few.
sentences.chinese: 远古玉器，金银器，名画，还有好多其他的。

sentences.english: Do not take along any gold or silver or copper in your belts;
sentences.chinese: 腰袋里，不要带金银铜钱。

sentences.english: Brocade is a class of richly decorative shuttle-woven fabrics, often made in colored silks with  gold and silver threads.
sentences.chinese: 锦是一种华美的织物，由染色的丝绸和金银线织成。

sentences.english: All the church plate has been locked up.
sentences.chinese: 教堂用的金银器皿都锁起来了。

sentences.english: Objective To identify 17 species of Flos Lonicerae.
sentences.chinese: 目的鉴别17种金银花的质量。

sentences.english: Stevenson wrote a book called Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文森写了一部名叫《金银岛》的小说。

sentences.english: The model of tectonic ore control of this deposit is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了银坑山式金银矿床的构造控矿模式。

sentences.english: Honeysuckle can accelerate lymphocyte transformation and strengthen phagocytic function of white blood cell.
sentences.chinese: 金银花能促进淋巴细胞转化，增强白细胞的吞噬功能。

sentences.english: In my garden there are roses and two kinds of honeysuckle .
sentences.chinese: 在我的花园里有玫瑰和两种金银花。

sentences.english: Silver and gold coins were once in common use in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 金银币曾经是美国的流通货币。

sentences.english: Thieves break into the palace and steal the king's treasure.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼破门进入宫殿偷走了国王的金银财宝。

sentences.english: And I'll give you much treasure.
sentences.chinese: 你行行好吧，我给你许多金银财宝。

sentences.english: The gold and silver plates of Liao dynasty are beautiful flowers of the northern nomadic people.
sentences.chinese: 辽代金银器是北方草原地区民族历史文物的一支奇葩。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the process of extracting honeysuckle in Sanhua Bikang capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察三花鼻康胶囊中金银花的提取工艺。

definition: silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
ten thousand strings of cash/very wealthy/millionaire
to bestow/to confer (a reward for service)/a reward
